api.description: Gets a list of legends in Sagnagrunnur.
Gets a list of legends in Sagnagrunnur based on a text search.
Gets a paged list of legends in Sagnagrunnur.

Gets information about a legend based on a given ID. Tags are a list of keywords which the legend has. Places are a list of places mentioned in the legend. Informants are list of either informants ('h') or collectors ('s') of this legend.
Gets a list of legends in Sagnagrunnur which have a specific keyword ID. Same as /tags/legends/:id.
Gets a list of places names from Sagnagrunnur.
Gets a list of place names in a specific county (sýsla).
Gets a list of place names in a specific municipality (hreppur).
Gets a list of places which are related to legends which are related to a specific tag/keyword.
Gets information about a place by a given ID. These information include a list of legends which mention the place and a list of people that lived there.
Same as /place/:id but by a given key.
Gets a list of county IDs and keys in Sagnagrunnur.
Gets a list of places that are geo-located.
Gets a list of places that are geo-located and related to legends.
Gets a list of places that are geo-located and related to legends which are related to a specific tag/keyword.
Gets a list of places from the National Library keyplace list.
Gets a list of municipality keys from the National Library keyplace list.
Gets a list of all tags/keywords. Each record has a number indicating how many legends are connected to the tag.
Gets a list of legends in Sagnagrunnur which have a specific keyword ID. Same as /legends/tag/:id.
Get a list of tags which are related to a given tag ID. The relations are based on which other tags are related to legends with the given tag ID.
Gets a list of persons in Sagnagrunnur.
Gets a information about a person in Sagnagrunnur including dates of birth and death if available as well as the persons home and list of legends told or collected by that person.
Search for a specific person name in Sagnagrunnur.
Search for persons in Sagnagrunnur based on their date of birth.
